Contradict fact: The claim that "Nobody has ever done a National Prescription Drug Take Back Day until Trump took office" contradicts the fact that National Prescription Drug Take Back Day existed before Trump took office.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Trump's role in initiating National Prescription Drug Take Back Day by stating that it had never been done before his presidency.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that National Prescription Drug Take Back Day was never done before Trump took office.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Trump was solely responsible for initiating National Prescription Drug Take Back Day, without considering any previous efforts or initiatives.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the existence of National Prescription Drug Take Back Day that are not mentioned in the claim.
